title: Easy Italian bean salad
ingredients: 1 red chilli , seeded and finely chopped
2 x 400g cans cannellini beans , drained and rinsed
instructions: Finely chop the spring onions and put into a bowl with the garlic and the chilli. Mix in the cannellini beans and the butter beans. Whisk the olive oil with the white wine vinegar and add plenty of seasoning. Stir through the salad with plenty of chopped parsley.
